DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this First-in-Human study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability after single ascending oral doses of GLPG1690 given to healthy male subjects, compared to placebo. Also, the safety and tolerability of multiple ascending oral doses of GLPG1690 given to healthy male subjects daily for 14 days compared to placebo, will be evaluated. Furthermore, during the course of the study after single and multiple oral dose administrations, the amount of GLPG1690 present in the blood and urine (pharmacokinetics) as well as the reduction of biomarker levels by GLPG1690 in plasma samples (pharmacodynamics) will be characterized compared to placebo. The pharmacokinetics of a solid dosage formulation of GLPG1690 will be compared with those of a liquid dosage formulation of GLPG1690. Also, the potential of cytochrome P450 (CYP)3A4 induction after repeated dosing with GLPG1690 will be explored.
DOC.brief_title: First-in-Human Single and Multiple Dose of GLPG1690
DOC.criteria: Healthy male, age 1850 years BMI between 1830 kg/m2 Any condition that might interfere with the procedures or tests in this study Drug or alcohol abuse Smoking
